name: SpikeDodge
description:
This is my first game that I created in Python. I didn't know how normal game logic worked, so I wanted to give this a try. Pygame made it easy for me to understand the logic of a game. The goal of this game is pretty simple: you need to dodge the spikes. The game works on both PC and mobile :D

Controls:

- LEFT and RIGHT: move your ball

- SHIFT: accelerate

- ESC: back to the game menu

The music was made by Stef58
